    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addContainer​(order.packing.IContainer ic)
    checks if the container is closed because it can only be added if it is checks if the container is in treatment and if everything is well filled if the container already exists it cannot be added if the array where the containers are stored is full, the array is increased adds a new container to the shipping order

    increase or decrease the size of the array as needed

    checks if the container is in treatment and if everything is well filled find the container to remove removes a container from the shipping order if the container array has a lot of empty space the array is decremented
    void setDestination​(order.base.IPerson ip)
    setter for destination person
    void setStatus​(order.base.OrderStatus os)
    Setter for status A specific order for status should be preserved: 1-if the @param status is IN_TREATMENT then the status should be: AWAITS_TREATMENT 2-if the @param status is CLOSED then the status should be: IN_TREATMENT and the number of containers in the shipping order should be greater than 0.

    • addContainer

      public boolean addContainer​(order.packing.IContainer ic) throws order.exceptions.OrderException, order.exceptions.ContainerException
      checks if the container is closed because it can only be added if it is checks if the container is in treatment and if everything is well filled if the container already exists it cannot be added if the array where the containers are stored is full, the array is increased adds a new container to the shipping order
      Specified by:
      addContainer in interface shippingorder.IShippingOrder
      Parameters:
      ic - container to be added
      Returns:
      true if the container is inserted in the shipping order and false if the container already existsContainer in the shipping order
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.OrderException - if the shipping order status is not equal to IN_TREATMENT
      order.exceptions.ContainerException - if any parameter is null and if the container is not closed

    • removeContainer

      public boolean removeContainer​(order.packing.IContainer ic) throws order.exceptions.OrderException, order.exceptions.ContainerException
      checks if the container is in treatment and if everything is well filled find the container to remove removes a container from the shipping order if the container array has a lot of empty space the array is decremented
      Specified by:
      removeContainer in interface shippingorder.IShippingOrder
      Parameters:
      ic - container to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the container is removed in the shipping order and false if the container doesn't exists in the shipping order
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.OrderException - if the status is not IN_TREATMENT
      order.exceptions.ContainerException - if the parameter is null

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus​(order.base.OrderStatus os) throws order.exceptions.OrderException, order.exceptions.ContainerException, order.exceptions.PositionException
      Setter for status A specific order for status should be preserved: 1-if the @param status is IN_TREATMENT then the status should be: AWAITS_TREATMENT 2-if the @param status is CLOSED then the status should be: IN_TREATMENT and the number of containers in the shipping order should be greater than 0. Additionally, to close the shipping order, the shipping order should be validated 3-if the @param status is SHIPPED then the order status should be: closed
      Specified by:
      setStatus in interface shippingorder.IShippingOrder
      Parameters:
      os - represents the order status to change the status
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.OrderException - if the current status is not compatible with the status @param status to change
      order.exceptions.ContainerException - if the volume greater than the current volume (when shipping order is validated)
      order.exceptions.PositionException - if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the container or if some item is overlapping with other item (when shipping order is validated)

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Getter for shipping order unique identifier
      Specified by:
      getId in interface shippingorder.IShippingOrder
      Returns:
      shipping order unique identifier

    • getContainers

      public order.packing.IContainer[] getContainers()
      uses a temporary array to return only containers and not null positions
      Specified by:
      getContainers in interface shippingorder.IShippingOrder
      Returns:
      an array (without null positions) for the containers in the shipping order

    • validate

      public void validate() throws order.exceptions.ContainerException, order.exceptions.PositionException
      Checks if any container is invalid
      Specified by:
      validate in interface shippingorder.IShippingOrder
      Throws:
      order.exceptions.ContainerException - if the volume greater than the current volume
      order.exceptions.PositionException - if some item is outside (or is overflowing) the container or if some item is overlapping with other item
